example.name: autogen1
example.text: Mr. Mason slips into his standup mode and starts meting out that old-fashioned Jewish mischief to other people as well as to himself

example.name: autogen2
example.text: anti-takeover mischief by Secretary of Transportation Skinner , who professes to believe safety will be compromised if KLM and British Airways own interests in companies that fly airplanes
example.arg: by Secretary of Transportation Skinner , who professes to believe safety will be compromised if KLM and British Airways own interests in companies that fly airplanes
